original_text: That it might take hold of the ends of the earth, that the wicked might be shaken out of it?
korean_text: 그것으로 땅 끝을 붙잡고 악한 자들을 그 땅에서 떨쳐 버린 일이 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: That it might take hold of the ends of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 땅의 끝을 붙잡을 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: that the wicked might be shaken out of it?
